title: 109_hr2534
content: Personal Philanthropy Account Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction for cash contributions to a personal philanthropy account. Defines personal philanthropy account as a tax-exempt trust created to make distributions for charitable purposes. Sets forth rules providing for default charitable distributions in the event of an account holder's death and minimum annual distribution requirements. Allows an exclusion from the gross income of an employee for contributions made by an employer to the employee's personal philanthropy account.
